task.title: Copy Character
task.shortdesc: Copy a character to your computer's clipboard.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on any character in the IPA Map. From the context menu, select either Copy character to copy as a plain text string, Copy as HTML to copy as an HTML code, or Copy as Unicode HEX to copy the unicode number.
step.stepresult: The character will be copied to your computer's clipboard in the chosen format and can then be pasted into text fields both within Phon and in other programs.
